attributes.comment:
The memorandum is not that clear. Why the applicant needs to pay for services
that they do not want. Not all the applicants are eligible for an advance parole,
more over not all want an employment authorization. THERE IS NO NEED THAT
YOU INCREASE YOUR FEES TO IMPROVE YOUR SERVICE. The USCIS is
providing the most terrible consumer service in the planet. How they can send the
notices of action or employment card or green card REGULAR MAIL. They should
send it priority mail with delivery confirmation and that information should appear
in a site that the applicant will know what address they use to send the
correspondence. I have seen so many times the USCIS sending correspondence
to WRONG ADDRESSES. They really do not care about the applicants. The
applicants have to pay the price of the USCIS?s mistake by paying the Motion to
Reopen the case just because they are so afraid that the USCIS might close their
case.
In addition, why couples with kids born during their marriage need to go through
an interview. It is ridiculous because they do not need to prove that they got
married under a bonafide relationship when they have kids together. I notice that
now at least parents of US citizen are getting the residency without interview.
WHAT A GOAL!
Also, talking about NATURALIZATION PROCESS why the applicant has to pay
so much money just because the USCIS needs to pay for the rent of the
auditorium where the ceremony will take place. It should be optional if you want to
attend to the ceremony, you should pay extra and the ones that do not want to
attend the ceremony they take the oath after the interview. Another comment, the
new site is now more confused. I missed the old one who had more organize the
information.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By L. S.
